sentence.Network_en: They are not optimistic about a settlement of the eleven year conflict.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不是很有信心能和平解决这场长达11年的纷争。

sentence.Network_en: He was perpetually involving himself in this long lawsuit.
sentence.Network_cn: 他使自己无休止地卷入这场长时间的诉讼.

sentence.Network_en: Tom's army won a great victory , after a long and hard - fought battle.
sentence.Network_cn: 经过一场长时间的恶斗之后,汤姆的军队打了一个大胜仗.
